entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
